name: ShigellosisCombinationTestsThatIncludeShigellaSpeciesByCultureAndIdentification
title: Shigellosis (Combination Tests that include Shigella species by Culture and Identification)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Shigella species in a culture in combination with another organism.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Shigella culture/isolate; LOINC search: "(Shigella) (culture or isolate) -feed"),(Exclusion Criteria: LOINC codes for only shigella)
